title: Missing woman, 20, found stabbed to death on Maha road.
selftext: A 20-year-old woman from Uran, Yashashri Shinde, was found murdered near a petrol pump. She had informed her parents she was visiting a friend. Her parents suspect Dawood Shaikh, previously accused of molestation by Shinde, as the culprit. Police are treating the case as a murder by an unidentified person.
comments: Definitely a guy who was obsessing over her.
Peaceful community  at it again. Gandmasti

The Bangalore incident happened just like yesterday. Please do comment on the religion of that person too. 

A criminal is a criminal irrespective of their religion. When are you guys going to understand this?
